alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was outside watching the comet at midnight
alibi_lies.contradiction: Comet visible pre-dawn, not midnight

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was photographing the full moon that night
alibi_lies.contradiction: Moon was new, not full

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was tracking the International Space Station overhead
alibi_lies.contradiction: No ISS pass on that night

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was watching the meteor shower in April
alibi_lies.contradiction: Meteor shower doesn't happen in April

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was photographing the aurora borealis
alibi_lies.contradiction: Aurora not visible at that latitude/time

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was setting up to view the solar eclipse
alibi_lies.contradiction: No eclipse visible that day/location

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was monitoring solar flare activity on my radio
alibi_lies.contradiction: No solar activity reported

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was using my star chart to find Orion in the southern sky
alibi_lies.contradiction: Cited constellations not visible in that hemisphere

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was photographing the sunrise at 6 AM
alibi_lies.contradiction: Sunrise occurred after claimed time

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was observing Venus through my telescope at midnight
alibi_lies.contradiction: Venus not visible at midnight

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was changing the oil in my electric car
alibi_lies.contradiction: EVs don't require oil changes

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was replacing spark plugs in my electric vehicle
alibi_lies.contradiction: EVs don't have spark plugs

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was replacing the muffler on my EV
alibi_lies.contradiction: EVs don't have mufflers

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was jump-starting my electric vehicle
alibi_lies.contradiction: Jump-starting is unsafe/impossible for EVs

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was cleaning the fuel injectors on my Tesla
alibi_lies.contradiction: EVs don't have fuel injectors

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was fixing the radiator in my Tesla
alibi_lies.contradiction: Closed-loop cooling, not a radiator

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was replacing my car battery in the garage
alibi_lies.contradiction: Clock and radio not reset; battery wasn't replaced

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was waiting in line at the charging station
alibi_lies.contradiction: Car never connected to charger

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was fixing a flat tire on the roadside
alibi_lies.contradiction: Flat tire has no damage or signs of repair

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was mixing bleach and ammonia to clean the floor
alibi_lies.contradiction: Mixing bleach and ammonia is dangerous and creates toxic gas

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was diluting battery acid with water
alibi_lies.contradiction: Water causes acid to splatter

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I cleaned up the blood stain with bleach - no traces left
alibi_lies.contradiction: Luminol can still detect blood after bleaching

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was testing iron salts - they turned blue as expected
alibi_lies.contradiction: Iron salts don't turn blue

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I put out the grease fire with water
alibi_lies.contradiction: Water spreads grease fire

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I made instant ice by adding salt to the water
alibi_lies.contradiction: Salt lowers freezing point—no instant ice

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I removed the red wine stain with lemon juice
alibi_lies.contradiction: Lemon juice would set, not remove, the stain

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I removed all the rust using just baking soda
alibi_lies.contradiction: Baking soda too weak to remove rust alone

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I cleaned the silver jewelry with plain water
alibi_lies.contradiction: Water alone can't clean silver tarnish

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I neutralized the strong base with household vinegar
alibi_lies.contradiction: Vinegar not enough for strong base neutralization

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was comparing a 1943 Bordeaux with my collection
alibi_lies.contradiction: 1943 Bordeaux vintage was never released due to wartime shortages

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I visited the vineyard's tasting room on Tuesday
alibi_lies.contradiction: Vineyard is closed weekdays—visits are by appointment only

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I spilled red wine on my shirt while pouring
alibi_lies.contradiction: Stain pattern inconsistent with handedness of the suspect

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was decanting the 2005 Barolo for several hours
alibi_lies.contradiction: 2005 Barolo doesn't require long decanting—behavior is suspicious

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I opened the champagne bottle with my corkscrew
alibi_lies.contradiction: Champagne corks aren't removed with corkscrews

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was organizing wine bottles during the power outage
alibi_lies.contradiction: Wine cellars are pitch dark during blackouts—sorting impossible

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was helping with the Syrah harvest that week
alibi_lies.contradiction: Syrah harvest didn't align with alibi timing

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I store my best white wines in the kitchen wine rack
alibi_lies.contradiction: No serious collector stores white wine in a kitchen rack

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I cleaned up the broken wine bottle immediately
alibi_lies.contradiction: No wine smell or residue found at alleged cleanup site

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I could clearly read the vintage on the bottle
alibi_lies.contradiction: Label not visible in that vintage—covered by foil

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: The 1970s bottle had a modern screwcap closure
alibi_lies.contradiction: Screwcaps were rare in the 1970s—timeline is inaccurate

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I paired the coq au vin with Pinot Grigio
alibi_lies.contradiction: Recipe does not traditionally use Pinot Grigio

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I was casually handling this rare first appearance issue
alibi_lies.contradiction: Rare issue would be slabbed, not handled casually

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I got this Golden Age comic signed at the convention
alibi_lies.contradiction: Golden Age comic too fragile to sign; no collector would do this

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I have the rare blue variant of this issue
alibi_lies.contradiction: No blue variant exists for that comic

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: Batman first appeared in Detective Comics #28
alibi_lies.contradiction: Batman first appeared in #27, not #28

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I met Jack Kirby at the convention last year
alibi_lies.contradiction: Jack Kirby died in 1994; meeting him is impossible

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I stayed inside all day during the storm
alibi_lies.contradiction: Raincoat should be wet if recently worn

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: I saw everything from my kitchen window
alibi_lies.contradiction: Window visibility was physically impossible

alibi_lies.alibi_claim: Nobody was home during the heat wave
alibi_lies.contradiction: Healthy plants mean someone watered them

investigation_beats.description: Detective arrives at crime scene and makes initial assessment
investigation_beats.reveals: Basic facts: victim, location, apparent cause of death

investigation_beats.description: Interview witnesses and gather initial statements
investigation_beats.reveals: Alibis from all present, basic timeline of events

investigation_beats.description: Examine physical evidence and crime scene details
investigation_beats.reveals: Technical details that don't match witness statements

investigation_beats.description: Expert knowledge reveals fatal flaw in suspect's alibi
investigation_beats.reveals: Specific technical contradiction that proves deception

investigation_beats.description: Confrontation leads to confession and full explanation
investigation_beats.reveals: Complete truth: method, motive, and opportunity explained

props_evidence.name: Vintage Wine Bottle
props_evidence.description: 1943 Bordeaux with suspicious labeling and provenance
props_evidence.reveals: Historical impossibility of vintage due to wartime
props_evidence.how_discovered: Label examined under magnification reveals modern printing

props_evidence.name: Astronomical Chart
props_evidence.description: Star chart showing celestial positions for specific date
props_evidence.reveals: Visibility impossibility of claimed celestial observation
props_evidence.how_discovered: Cross-referenced with astronomical database and calculations

props_evidence.name: EV Diagnostic Computer
props_evidence.description: Vehicle's onboard computer with maintenance logs
props_evidence.reveals: Vehicle lacks components mentioned in alibi
props_evidence.how_discovered: Downloaded diagnostic data contradicts claimed repairs

props_evidence.name: Chemical Safety Data Sheet
props_evidence.description: Official documentation of chemical properties and hazards
props_evidence.reveals: Dangerous reaction mentioned in alibi would be lethal
props_evidence.how_discovered: Consulted chemical database and safety protocols

props_evidence.name: Comic Grading Certificate
props_evidence.reveals: Comic handling described in alibi would void certification
props_evidence.how_discovered: Examined CGC certification and handling requirements

props_evidence.name: Weather Station Data
props_evidence.description: Local meteorological records for specific time period
props_evidence.how_discovered: Accessed local weather service historical data

props_evidence.name: Plant Care Schedule
props_evidence.description: Detailed log of plant watering and maintenance
props_evidence.reveals: Plants were recently cared for despite abandonment claim
props_evidence.how_discovered: Found hidden in greenhouse with recent entries

props_evidence.name: Security Camera Footage
props_evidence.how_discovered: Retrieved from facility's digital security system

props_evidence.name: Laboratory Equipment Manual
props_evidence.description: Technical documentation for chemical processing equipment
props_evidence.reveals: Equipment operation contradicts safety claim in alibi

props_evidence.name: Comic Publication History
props_evidence.description: Database of comic publishing dates and variant information
props_evidence.reveals: Claimed variant never existed or creator meeting impossible
props_evidence.how_discovered: Researched comic industry database and creator biographies
